currentIssues.description: Text contrast appears insufficient for gray lyrics text against dark background
No visible focus indicators on settings and upload buttons
Inconsistent text hierarchy - chord names and lyrics have similar visual weight
currentIssues.location: Chord notation (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) and lyrics

currentIssues.description: Gray text (#6B7280 approx) on dark background likely fails WCAG AA standards
Inconsistent vertical spacing between chord lines and lyrics
Touch targets for settings and upload buttons appear borderline small

recommendations.title: Improve text contrast for lyrics
recommendations.description: Change lyrics text color from gray to a lighter shade that meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 contrast ratio)

recommendations.title: Add ARIA labels to icon buttons
recommendations.description: Provide screen reader context for settings and upload buttons

recommendations.title: Add focus indicators to interactive elements
recommendations.description: Add visible focus rings to all buttons and interactive elements for keyboard navigation

recommendations.title: Enhance visual hierarchy between chords and lyrics
recommendations.description: Make chord names more prominent with increased size and weight to clearly distinguish from lyrics
recommendations.code:
className='text-2xl font-bold text-yellow-400' // For chords
className='text-lg text-gray-200' // For lyrics

recommendations.title: Increase touch target size
recommendations.description: Ensure all interactive elements meet 44x44px minimum touch target size
recommendations.code: className='w-11 h-11 p-2.5' // For icon buttons

recommendations.title: Implement consistent spacing system
recommendations.description: Use consistent vertical spacing between chord/lyric pairs using an 8px grid system
recommendations.code:
className='space-y-8' // Between verses
className='space-y-2' // Between chord and its lyric
